SELECT p.id, p.name, p.code, p.description, p.resource, p.action, p.category, p.parent_id, p.sort_order, p.is_enabled, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.is_enabled = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC, p.id ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.code, p.description, p.resource, p.action, p.category, p.parent_id, p.sort_order, p.is_enabled, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.is_enabled = 1 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC, p.id ASC
